file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: APIClarity PluginB
  version: 0.0.1
  description: APIClarity PluginA API
paths:
  /eventAnnotations/{eventID}:
    get:
      operationId: GetEventAnnotations
      summary: Get Annotations for an event
      description: Get Trace Analyzer Annotations for a specific event
      parameters:
        - name: eventID
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Annotation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Annotations'
  /apiAnnotations/{apiID}:
    get:
      operationId: GetAPIAnnotations
      summary: Get Annotations for an API
      description: Get Trace Analyzer Annotations for a specific API
      parameters:
        - name: apiID
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Annotation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Annotations'
    delete:
      operationId: DeleteAPIAnnotations
      summary: Delete Annotations for an API
      description: Get Trace Analyzer Annotations for a specific API
      parameters:
        - name: apiID
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - in: query
          name: name
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          description: name of the annotation
      responses:
        '204':
          description: Successful deletion

components:
  schemas:
    Annotation:
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        annotation:
          type: string
        severity:
          type: string
        kind:
          type: string
      required:
        - id
        - name
        - annotation
        - severity
        - kind
    Annotations:
      type: object
      required:
        - total
      properties:
        total:
          type: 'integer'
          description: 'Total event annotations count'
        items:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Annotation'
